ygData.subject: Overriding robots-honoring-policy for embeds
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, IIPC Harvesting Practices Report states: Crawls IA performs for IA include all content published to any domain or host that is not excluded by robots.txt.

Subject: Overriding robots-honoring-policy for embeds
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=477609468; y=lvQsJyiNtCo0liD_TeRNcPOBVIN4FNZTatLYUQ-8xs1YKawHY6ls5cK3
X-Yahoo-Profile: drazenko.celjak

Hi,

IIPC Harvesting Practices Report states:

"Crawls IA performs for IA include all content published to any domain 
or host that is not excluded by robots.txt. They ignore robots.txt for 
all embeds."


How do I setup Heritrix (1.14.4) to ignore robots.txt only for embeds? 
Or images (.png,.jpeg,.gif,...)?

Is the right way to add refinement with .*\.(jpeg|jpg|gif|png)$ regexp 
and set there ignore robots-honoring-policy?


Best regards,
Drazenko
